tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crops (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50),
  nitrogen_requirement FLOAT,
  phosphorus_requirement FLOAT,
  potassium_requirement FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE crops (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  nitrogen_req FLOAT,
  phosphorus_req FLOAT,
  potassium_req FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fertilizers (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  fertilizer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  nitrogen_content FLOAT,
  phosphorus_content FLOAT,
  potassium_content FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Crop (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     name TEXT NOT NULL,
     type TEXT NOT NULL,
     optimal_ph FLOAT NOT NULL,
     recommended_fertilizer TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Fertilizer (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     name TEXT NOT NULL,
     type TEXT NOT NULL,
     npk_ratio TEXT NOT NULL,
     price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE CropFertilization (crop_id INT,
     fertilizer_id INT,
     quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
     date DATE NOT NULL,
     PRIMARY KEY (crop_id, fertilizer_id));

CREATE TABLE fertilizers (
    fertilizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fertilizer_name VARCHAR(255),
    nutrient_id INT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    price_per_unit FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fertilization_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    nutrient_id INT,
    fertilizer_id INT,
    recommended_amount FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fertilizers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_tests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    nutrient_id INT NOT NULL,
    nutrient_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (nutrient_id) REFERENCES nutrients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE fertilization_plans (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    fertilizer_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (fertilizer_id) REFERENCES fertilizers(id)
);
